body: I means, the Art is fine. The Plot is plain (Not like it is the first of its Kind). / The important question is can this one be count as "NTR"? Or those panels were just there for "Self-reflecting Check"?
@jazzboy is there some kind of secret society on this sight? i only recognize you because your commente are on literally everything posted on this god forsaken sight.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me, awesome doujinshi btw
great idea, it's a pity that in reality there is no such thing)
